Open source stories

  • About

Welcome to PR Podcast

PR podcast is an interview podcast with open source creators.

You can listen to each episode in our Telegram channel or you can subscribe to our mailing list to receive an email after each episode is published.

For updates and news, follow PR Podcast on Twitter.

List of episodes

  • Flutter Charts
    Sun Aug 23 2020
    A library to draw fantastic charts in Flutter
  • Awesome Corona Virus
    Sun Oct 25 2020
    Huge collection of useful projects and resources for COVID-19
  • Kateb
    Sun Jun 06 2021
    Install and update free Farsi fonts
  • Kutt
    Sat Jun 26 2021
    Free Modern URL Shortener
  • Art
    Sun Jul 11 2021
    ASCII art library for Python
  • Icono
    Sat Aug 14 2021
    One tag One icon, no font or svg, Pure CSS

PR Podcast is created by: Arash Taher and Mohammad Moozeh
